channel.title: Plan on Utkarsh Maheshwari
channel.description: Recent content in Plan on Utkarsh Maheshwari

item.title: Learn Vim, the fun way
item.description: Okay, it’s been a while since I last wrote. I got a little busy with my acads is all. But not to worry because I have a new project at hand! Woohoo! And it’s finally what I really like to do; low level shiz and not WebDev. Enough beating around the bush, let me introduce you to, ‘A Vim Story’, the new best way to learn Vim. The idea is to make a game out of it and let the user enjoy the steep learning curve, rather than dread it like I did.

item.title: Initial commit
item.description: So the customary Hello worldÂ was in line. There. I said it. The program seems to be working fine. Anyway, this first post is basically for describing what and why. The motivation and reason for this is not a very grand one, but nonetheless important. This blog serves as a journal, for me and for whoever it may concern, of stuff I explore and venture into during my days on this planet (and any other planet).
